text.body:
anāthanāthāya namo 'stu tasmai yenopadiṣṭā haṭhayogavidyā/
virājate pronmatarā+yogān āroḍhum icchor adhirohiṇīva//
praṇamya śrī guronāthosvātmā+meṇa yoginā/
kevalaṃ rājayogāya haṭhayogopadiśyate//
bhrāntyā bahumatadhvānte rājamārgamajāyata/
haṭhapradīpikāṃ ante svātmārāma kṛpākaraḥ//
haṭhavidyā hi macchendragorakṣādyā hi jānate/
svātmārāmo 'thavā yogī +nāte tatprasādataḥ//
ānāthanāthamaccandraṃśābarānandibhairavam/
cāraṅgi++gorakṣavirūpākṣabileśayaḥ// *
manthānabhairavaś caivasi+buddhiś ca ka++/
yoraṇ+++sānandasiddhapādaś ca sarvadā// *
kānīropūjyapādaś ca nityanātho nirañjana/
+pālībindunādaś ca kākacaṇḍīścarālayaḥ//
allamāprabhude+śca ++++ pi caṇḍilaḥ/
bālākī nāgabhogaś ca kaṇṭhakāpālikas tathā//
ityādayo mahāsiddhāḥ haṭhayogaprabhāvataḥ/
khaṇḍayitvā kāladaṇḍaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ vicaran ta thā//
saṃsāratāpataptānāṃ samāśrayamaṭho haraḥ/
aśeṣayogatantrāṇām ādhārakahaṭho maṭhaḥ//
haṭhavidyā paraṃ gopyaṃ yogināṃ siddhim icchatām/
bhaved vidyā hy atī guptā nirvīryā tu prakāśitā//
surājye dhārmike deśe subhikṣe nirupadrave/
ekānte maṭhikāma+ sthātavyaṃ haṭhayogināṃ//
alpadvāram arandhragartamadhikaṃ nātyuccanīcāyataṃ/
samyag gomayasāndraliptamamalaṃ niśśeṣabodhātmakaṃ/
bāhye maṇḍapavedi+paruciraṃ prākārasaṃveṣṭitaṃ/
proktaṃ yogamaṭhasya lakṣaṇam idaṃ siddhyair haṭhābhyāsinām//
evaṃvidhamaṭhe sthitvā sarvacintāvivarjitaḥ/
gurūpadiṣṭamārgeṇa yogam eva sadābhyaset//
atyāhāraḥ prayāsaś ca prajalpo ++magrahaḥ/
janasaṅgaś ca laulya ca ṣaṭ ca yogaṃ vinaśyati//
utsāhaṃ nicchā+dhairyaṃ tattvajñānātma++nam/
jana++parityāgaṃ ṣaṭ cayoge prasiddhyati//
haṭhasya prathamāṅgatvād āsanaṃ pūrvam +cyate/
tat kuryād āsanasthairyam ārogyaṃ cāṅgapādapaṃ//
vasiṣṭhādyaiś ca munibhi+ccādādyaiś ca yogibhiḥ/
aṅgīkṛtā nyāsanāni kathyante kāticinmayā//
jānu+r antaraṃ samyak kṛtvā pādatale ubhe/
ṛjukāyasamāsīnaḥ svastikaṃ tat pracakṣate//
savye dakṣiṇagulphaṃ tu pṛṣṭhapārśve niyojayet/
dakṣiṇe ca tathā savyaṃ gomukhaṃ gomukhaṃ tadā//
